languages.text: "Ну дела! Видно, сам Император нам улыбнулся!" {n}Рета рубит ладонью воздух.{/n} "То есть — благодарю, Ваша Светлость. Все организуем в лучшем виде".

"Well, isn't this something! The Emperor Himself must've smiled upon us!" {n}Reta makes a triumphant gesture.{/n} "I mean, uh, thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You'll be pleased with the results."
languages.original_text: "Ну дела! Видно, сам Император нам улыбнулся!" {n}Рета рубит ладонью воздух.{/n} "То есть — благодарю, Ваша Светлость. Все организуем в лучшем виде".

traits.locale_text: "Well, isn't this something! The Emperor Himself must've smiled upon us!" {n}Reta makes a triumphant gesture.{/n} "I mean, uh, thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You'll be pleased with the results."
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

traits.locale_text: "Well, isn't this something! The Emperor Himself must've smiled upon us!" {n}Reta makes a triumphant gesture.{/n} "I mean, uh, thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You'll be pleased with the results."

traits.locale_text: "Well, isn't this something! The Emperor Himself must've smiled upon us!" {n}Reta makes a triumphant gesture.{/n} "I mean, uh, thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You'll be pleased with the results."

traits.locale_text: "Well, isn't this something! The Emperor Himself must've smiled upon us!" {n}Reta makes a triumphant gesture.{/n} "I mean, uh, thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You'll be pleased with the results."
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

traits.locale_text: "Well, isn't this something! The Emperor Himself must've smiled upon us!" {n}Reta makes a triumphant gesture.{/n} "I mean, uh, thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You'll be pleased with the results."
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: “哎呀，这可真是太棒了！帝皇本人一定是对我们露出了微笑！”{n}蕾塔比了个胜利的手势。{/n}“我是说，呃，谢谢您，大人。您一定会满意的。”
languages.original_text: "Well, isn't this something! The Emperor Himself must've smiled upon us!" {n}Reta makes a triumphant gesture.{/n} "I mean, uh, thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You'll be pleased with the results."

traits.locale_text: “哎呀，这可真是太棒了！帝皇本人一定是对我们露出了微笑！”{n}蕾塔比了个胜利的手势。{/n}“我是说，呃，谢谢您，大人。您一定会满意的。”
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: «¿En serio? ¡Qué alegría! ¡El Emperador mismo nos ha sonreído!». {n}Reta hace un gesto triunfal.{/n} «Perdón, quiero decir, gracias, mi{mf|lord|lady}. No {mf|le|la} decepcionará».
languages.original_text: "Well, isn't this something! The Emperor Himself must've smiled upon us!" {n}Reta makes a triumphant gesture.{/n} "I mean, uh, thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You'll be pleased with the results."

traits.locale_text: «¿En serio? ¡Qué alegría! ¡El Emperador mismo nos ha sonreído!». {n}Reta hace un gesto triunfal.{/n} «Perdón, quiero decir, gracias, mi{mf|lord|lady}. No {mf|le|la} decepcionará».
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: 「あら、これは価値があるんじゃないかしら！皇帝ご自身が私たちに微笑んでくださったに違いないわ！」{n}レタは勝ち誇ったような身ぶりをする。{/n}「つまり、その、ありがとうございます、陛下。結果にはきっとご満足いただけると思います」
languages.original_text: "Well, isn't this something! The Emperor Himself must've smiled upon us!" {n}Reta makes a triumphant gesture.{/n} "I mean, uh, thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You'll be pleased with the results."

traits.locale_text: 「あら、これは価値があるんじゃないかしら！皇帝ご自身が私たちに微笑んでくださったに違いないわ！」{n}レタは勝ち誇ったような身ぶりをする。{/n}「つまり、その、ありがとうございます、陛下。結果にはきっとご満足いただけると思います」
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: "Das ist doch ein Wort! Der Imperator selbst hat auf uns herabgelächelt!" {n}Reta macht eine triumphierende Geste.{/n} "Das heißt, äh, danke, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ihr werdet damit sicher zufrieden sein."
languages.original_text: "Well, isn't this something! The Emperor Himself must've smiled upon us!" {n}Reta makes a triumphant gesture.{/n} "I mean, uh, thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You'll be pleased with the results."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist doch ein Wort! Der Imperator selbst hat auf uns herabgelächelt!" {n}Reta macht eine triumphierende Geste.{/n} "Das heißt, äh, danke, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ihr werdet damit sicher zufrieden sein."
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: « Quelle bonne nouvelle ! L'Empereur en personne nous sourit ! {n}s'exclame Réta en faisant un geste triomphant.{/n} Euh, je veux dire... merci, Votre Seigneurie. Vous ne serez pas {mf|déçu|déçue}. »
languages.original_text: "Well, isn't this something! The Emperor Himself must've smiled upon us!" {n}Reta makes a triumphant gesture.{/n} "I mean, uh, thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You'll be pleased with the results."

traits.locale_text: « Quelle bonne nouvelle ! L'Empereur en personne nous sourit ! {n}s'exclame Réta en faisant un geste triomphant.{/n} Euh, je veux dire... merci, Votre Seigneurie. Vous ne serez pas {mf|déçu|déçue}. »
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: "Hele şükür! İmparator Hazretleri yüzümüze gülmüş demek ki!" {n}Reta, muradına ermişçesine bir hareket yapıyor.{/n} "Yani şey, teşekkür ederiz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Bu tercihinizden pişman olmayacaksınız."
languages.original_text: "Well, isn't this something! The Emperor Himself must've smiled upon us!" {n}Reta makes a triumphant gesture.{/n} "I mean, uh, thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. You'll be pleased with the results."
